thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 2 of 14
thread.title: Bryn Spray

author: Bryn Spray
title: Bryn Spray
text:
For my chosen service, I chose the Trial of Valor raid on Normal difficulty. Finally got that one over and done with thanks to their help.
Unfortunately, I didn't get the gear I would have needed to be able to raise my ilvl to a higher degree, but that can't be helped. I'll just need to do another run at a later point.
I got quick replies to any queries I had, and I generally felt like I was being heard. Thanks again, guys! :D
